category_descriptions.header_footer_leak_in_stem: Exam header/footer content (代號, 頁次, 座號, 等別, 類科, 科目, etc.) leaked into question stem text
category_descriptions.instruction_text_in_stem: Exam instruction text (不必抄題, 申論試卷, 禁止使用電子計算器, 2B鉛筆, etc.) found in question stem
category_descriptions.missing_answer_for_choice: Choice-type question is missing the answer field
category_descriptions.metadata_in_options: Answer options contain exam metadata or header/footer content
category_descriptions.notes_leaked_question_content: Question/essay prompt content leaked into the notes array, split across multiple note entries (should be in a question stem instead)
category_descriptions.notes_leaked_formula_or_table: Mathematical formula, statistical table, or technical reference data leaked into the notes array (should be in question content or a separate reference field)
category_descriptions.notes_leaked_formula_fragment: Isolated formula fragment or symbol leaked into notes
category_descriptions.notes_leaked_section_header: Section header or label leaked into notes
category_descriptions.notes_non_standard_content: Non-standard content in notes that doesn't match expected instruction patterns
category_descriptions.notes_empty_entry: Notes array contains empty string entry
category_descriptions.notes_invalid_type: Notes array entry is not a string
category_descriptions.empty_stem: Question has an empty or missing stem
category_descriptions.empty_options: Choice question has no options at all
category_descriptions.empty_option_value: One or more option values are empty strings
category_descriptions.insufficient_options: Choice question has fewer than 2 options
category_descriptions.answer_not_in_options: Answer references an option key that doesn't exist in the options object
category_descriptions.page_break_artifact_in_stem: Page break artifacts (代號:XXXXX, page ranges) embedded in stem text
category_descriptions.json_parse_error: JSON file could not be parsed
